SEARCH
Package assignment.util

Class AbstractUtilityClass

java.lang.Object
assignment.util.AbstractUtilityClass
Direct Known Subclasses:
Metrics, ScientificCalc, SpaceTravelFinancing
public class AbstractUtilityClass extends Object
This class contains the static methods for all the Utility Classes.
